natural shape [firstshape]: â‡’ #1836 Ko-Oni

(undisciplined [undisciplined], undead [undead], ethereal [ethereal], need-not-eat [neednoteat], spirit-sight [spiritsight])

item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
Oni are almost immortal. If their body is slain, their spirit will survive. If the spirit is not slain as well, it will reform a new body over time. Oni spirits are ghosts and can be banished.
